#Text=The Miami Heat ( 21 - 26 ) defeated the Boston Celtics ( 16 - 30 ) 83 - 75 on Sunday at the TD Garden in Boston .
#Text=The Heat got off to a strong start in this one , out - scoring the Celtics 44 - 31 in the first half alone .
#Text=They were superior shooters in this game , going 42 percent from the field , while the Celtics went just 37 percent from the floor .
#Text=The Heat also secured a 46 - 40 rebounding advantage .
#Text=For the Heat , Hassan Whiteside just kept on going Sunday , recording another impressive performance .
#Text=In 29 minutes , Whiteside finished with 20 points ( 10 - 17 FG ) , nine rebounds and three blocks .
#Text=He came just one rebound shy of notching his fourth double - double in a row , a stretch where he 's averaging 17 points , 16 rebounds and four blocks over those four games .
#Text=Chris Bosh also had a solid showing , posting 18 points ( 6 - 19 FG , 1 - 4 3Pt , 5 - 7 FT ) , seven rebounds and two assists .
#Text=It was n't his best day shooting the ball , but he still did enough to help secure the victory , even with both Dwyane Wade ( hamstring ) and Luol Deng ( calf ) sitting out with injuries .

#Text=Coming off the bench , Tyler Johnson was the only other player in double figures , fininshing with 13 points ( 4 - 9 FG , 1 - 3 3Pt , 4 - 6 FT ) , nine rebounds , four assists and two steals in 27 minutes .
#Text=This was only his third game of the season , while the points , rebounds and assists were all season - highs for the rookie .
#Text=The Celtics saw their biggest production from the duo of Avery Bradley and Tyler Zeller .
#Text=Bradley finished with 17 points ( 8 - 15 FG , 1 - 4 3Pt ) , four rebounds and two assists , while Zeller had 17 points ( 6 - 13 FG , 5 - 8 FT ) , six rebounds and four assists .
#Text=Bradley shot a combined 8 - for - 27 from the field over his last two games , so it was good to see him shoot the ball a little better on Sunday .
#Text=Zeller is only averaging 9 points per game so far this season , so his points totals were a nice surprise for the Celtics , despite the loss .
#Text=The only other Celtic to reach double figures in points was Brandon Bass , who went 7 - for - 14 from the field to record 15 points , while also adding six rebounds and two blocked shots .
#Text=He 's started to heat up , as he 's combined for 32 points and 14 rebounds over his last two games .
#Text=The Heat 's next game will be on the road against the Detroit Pistons on Tuesday , while the Celtics will travel to New York to play the Knicks on Tuesday .
